companyDescription: Isologic Innovative Radiopharmaceuticals (ISOLOGIC) is a nationwide radiopharmaceutical company, dedicated to nuclear medicine and the science of Radiopharmaceutical production. Our commitment to these fields extends to the communities we serve. We have over 170 team members focused on serving our customers and their patients. We utilize our significant experience, expertise and networks in Nuclear Pharmacy to provide our customers and patients with reliable; safe and high-quality radiopharmaceutical products and services.
description:
Isologic Innovative Radiopharmaceuticals, the industry leader in preparation and delivery of nuclear medicines, has an immediate position available as a full time courier driver.
As a Customer Delivery Associate (delivery driver), you will support pharmacy operations by handling, packaging and delivering radiopharmaceuticals.
KEY RESPONSIBILITIES/ESSENTIAL FUNCTIONS

 Processing prepared products by wrapping and placing in proper delivery containers, preparing shipping paperwork and labels
 Handle, package and deliver radiopharmaceuticals and hazardous materials in compliance with all regulations and company policies
 Assist with tasks required in the laboratory
 Short and long distance runs available

REQUIRED QUALIFICATIONS

 Valid G driver’s license and clean abstract
 Ability to lift 50 lbs. on a regular basis throughout the day
 Ability to accommodate shift changes based on business needs
 Ability to work shifts that have staggered start times beginning as early as 4am through 8am
 Strong skills in teamwork and customer service

Previous delivery driving experience and/or handling and transporting pharmaceuticals or radioactive materials would be an asset. All training will be provided and paid for by Isologic Innovative Radiopharmaceuticals.
We welcome applications from all candidates, including retirees or semi-retirees.
We are an equal opportunity employer. It is important to note that only those whose applications have been retained will be contacted.
